content.detailedDescription: While standing outside in the parking lot at work, i noticed the object traveling slowly from the nw traveling toward the se. the object had what appeared to be 7 lights and was triangular in shape. it made no sound. the apporoximate speed was rather slow, around 2 0- 30 knots. the wind was calm and the weather was slightly overcast. the object was dark with pulsating lights forming different colors. we were not worried and were calm through the experience.
content.summary: Triangle shaped craft, moving slowly towards se

content.detailedDescription:
The daylight pics were between 3pm and 6pm. it has happened several times. i didn't write the dates and times down. i just got the camera and took pics when we saw them.  

the  night pics are when we were suppose to have the super moon. a bunch of orbs showed up in the photos like they were behind the clouds. there were no stars visible and the orbs are not in all the pics, but one pics seems to have at least 6 tiny orbs in it.

i have a nikon coolpix 14.0 megapixel with 3.6x zoom. i just set it on auto in day time and set it for sunset at night. the flash did not go off on any of the pics and i have not messed with photo shop. i just took all my pics off the cam and put them on the computer.

i sent these because i can not zoom in close enough to see what they are. there were never any noises with any of the pics. my eyes are very bad so i can't tell what they are. my daughter was with me for all the pics. hope y'all can zoom them in and tell me what they are.

thank you
amber baker
content.summary: Just flying with with a white trail and no sound. front tip of trail looked red.

content.detailedDescription:
Observed solid red light moving across sky at slow speed. no navigational lights as i have seen, living near military bases all my life. was very unusual.Was at work taking a smoke break. observed a solid reddish light moving east toward panama city, fla. light was very unusual based on my experiences. i think i just observed my first ufo. 

solid red light/ orb
continuous path west to east
slow moving
low flight path <500 ft
object moved out of view after approximately 3 min
appeared to be moving through cloud cover
viewed object behind outback steak house in destin fl
34908 emerald coast pkwy
destin, fl 32541
one additional witness
content.summary: Slow moving solid red light, no navigational lights

content.detailedDescription: It was about 11:35 at night and i was driving home from work when i first noticed a large pattern of lights visible directly in front of me about 50 degrees from the horizon. i initially thought they might be flares but they were moving to fast laterally to be flares. they were crimson red in color and appeared to flutter or twinkle a bit. there were 5 orbs total moving from west to east just below the cloud line. they were moving slightly faster than a plane would be. each light/orb was flying at a different altitude from one another and appeared to be in some sort of large formation. i pulled over into a gas station to observe them further, but as i was doing this the lights started to fade out and then disappeared. the total time i was able to observe was about 2 minutes. i often gaze into the night sky and have observed many planes, helicopters, satellites, etc.. but these orbs definitely seemed to be something different.
content.summary: Crimson red orbs observed in the night sky over southern louisiana moving from west to east.

content.detailedDescription: July 26, 2013 at approximately 10:50 p.M. while sitting outside facing north i witnessed a silent, steady, bright white light moving north. it's light was visible for approximately 3 sec or so, and then it completely disappeared. after about 5-8 secs it reappeared a little farther north and slightly to the west. again, it was silent, steady, and bright. like before, after a few sec it disappeared. it repeated everything i mentioned before for a 3rd time except for this time right before it disappeared the light brightened and intensified. when this occurred an overwhelming feeling of awe came over me...I even spoke aloud "this is incredible!!" after it vanished i think it reappeared once more, but i could barely see it...The distance was far away. the while sighting itself lasted about a min or so.
content.summary: Silent, steady, and bright light appearing and disappearing while moving north

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Hi its 12:00 am i was outside having cigarette notice this bright objects coming from the north at first put it off as a airplane but then the light just went to alititude to wear you could barely see it then went slowly.Wasnt going to report it but then still in back yard it came back and flew very low over my house no sound but the magnetism was strong coming off of it.Im a reiki healer my body feels subtle change in electricity and made me feel like i never have.It was a red rose color large object slowly hovering and moving south i called 911 in tampa fl to document it.So that we can maybe access fda records to see if a unknown object in the known area hope this helps.Btw i know a lot about lights of a plane i was born at west point and been in military my entire life.This is not a plane or helicopter
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo over claire mel city tampa fl

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were in north syracuse, new york at 9:30 p.M. and i was looking up at the sky and noticed what looked to be a bright star; however, when looking longer it appeared to have a red flashing light and then would flash lights of other colors (blue, green, yellowish).  this object was clearly not an airplane as it remained stationary.  we drove home an alternate route and could still see this object very well in the sky and stopped our vehicle and got out to see if this was still emitting the same characteristics, which it did.  once we arrived home i got the binoculars and we went outdoors and the object was still there and actually there was another in close proximity with the same blinking lights.  the time frame of this was now well over an hour and a half.

it is now 10:53 p.M. and the original object seems to remain in the same location; however, the second object has moved in a westerly direction.

i am sure this is not a star and would like to know if others have seen or reported the same object(s).  this of course has stirred some excitement and  i will be looking again tomorrow night to see if this is still there.
content.summary: Unidentifiable flashing lights stationary in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home from a ballgame in indianapolis driving due west.  i turned south and noticed a bright orange light in the sky to the east that i'd never seen in that spot. i live in speedway. i first noticed the object because it was so bright.  i first thought it might be a helicopter or a firework.  i saw a helicopter to the south and could readily see the difference. i had a cd playing and my windows were closed so i didn't hear anything.  it had been sprinkling a little too.  i thought okay if this is a firework it is going to descend or make a sound or something, but nothing happened.  it just stayed there and glowed very bright orange-red.  i thought about phoning my sister who was in the house but i didn't want to take my eyes off of the light so i didn't.  i walked up the driveway and the light just diminished and finally vanished without a sound from where i was.  i couldn't tell if it ascended and disappeared or disappeared where it was hovering.  it disappeared into a tiny dot to nothing.  the whole thing lasted no more than 3 minutes.  i came in the house and told my sister i had just seen a ufo.  it was a ufo to me.  i've never seen a helicopter shine orange-red and without flashing lights like the helicopter i saw in the sky at the same time to the south, nor have i seen one be silent. from what i could tell it seemed to pulsate some but stayed bright orange-red. thank you for being here so i could report this!  it didn't upset me, but i will remain puzzled by what i saw.
content.summary: I saw a bright orange-red object that i could not identify.  never have seen anything like that in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I went out side to smoke a cig at 10 fifteen pm and i had a feeling that i was going to see something. i was staring at the sky, there was lots of stars, i had a feeling i was going to see something and then i did. it was very wierd i couldnt stop staring at it. it was first like a normal star but it was moving back and forth, not the whole sky just a small part but it was making directional changes, then it got really bright, brighter than any star and it was still moving, not a constant speed either i was in awe. it then blinked out and came back like it was when i first saw it. it moved north, getting bright and dim a few times. i know this was not some shooting star, and not anything else because it changed directions a few times. i live a mile from an airport also, i am an airplane mech, and i know planes. this was no plane. i really want someone north of me to be looking in the sky now, maybe in mass, new hampshire, vermont, or maine. it was moving quick and dead north,i was mesmorized by it. this is not my first sighting either, and for some reason i knew i was going to see something tonight. i really want someone else to see the same thing, so i would have proof.Jon
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Starlike ufo moving all around at first became very bright a few times blinked out then came back then moved north not in one direction fading in and out

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: We were camping at the illinois river, in selma, oregon when we heard what sounded like a plane flying over. four of us were in a tent and first we saw a red light that at first glance appeared to be a plane light very high in the sky, a few seconds later there were 2 more lights flashing behind it and we noticed it was not 2 planes flying in a path high in the sky but 1 large object very low flying just above the treeline!! it appeared to be a vary narrow triangular shape, with 1 red light up near the front & 2 flashing lights in the middle. it flew slow with a loud humming type sound and followed the river to the nw.
content.summary: Ufo slowly flying over the illinois river, in selma, or.

content.detailedDescription: I routinely notice star like objects seemingly at extremely high altitudes moving to and from across the night sky. i live in a rural area with few light sources providing a good view of stars on clear nights. i also routinely have commercial aircraft pass my viewing area (in my back yard) which has made picking out the other objects easier as their characteristics share little in common. my initial purpose for viewing the night sky was just star gazing because i used to live in ft. lauderdale where stars are barely visible, but in just looking up i began noticing what i thought to be a star begin to move. at first i dismissed the moving lights as shooting stars but quickly noticed they did not move as such. at times the lights seem to be on a steady path and then will change direction by approximately 3 to 10 degrees in an apparent short distance. additionally their movement is best described as watching a frog swim. most always moving forward but slowing momentarily (like rotating your arms back for the next swimming stroke) then continuing at its normal pace. as well the lights will vary greatly in their intensity, from some barely visible and hard to track to some going very bright then back to a steady glow as they travel.  i lose sight of them sometimes instantly,then others just fade away and then others pass out of sight due to my tree line. my feelings are just one of wonder during and after these sightings, basic curiosity i guess. on occasion i have pointed them out to my wife and/or visiting friends and they don't really have an explanation either. not looking for any news crew to visit me or anything but some intern or someone with a decent telescope so we can get a closer look to try and determine what these lights may be. either way they make looking up at the night sky that much more interesting. would love to video or photograph these lights but the altitude appears so high and i do not have any sophisticated equipment.
content.summary: Routinely observe starlike objects very high with varying speeds, varying brightness and direction changes

content.detailedDescription: We were on our way to four winds casino in new buffalo. while driving the sun reflected off of an object in the sky. it shone a very bright silver when the sunlight hit it then quickly became white. even though it matched the clouds we were still able to keep an eye on the orb.  it was moving in a straight line when i realized it had gone back the other way just a bit and was no longer going in a straight path, it had come to a dead stop. i saw a plane not far from the object so i knew that it was not moving. what shocked us the most was watching this orb for minutes, all of the sudden it had just vanished. it was nowhere to be found. we kept an eye to the sky for sometime afterwards thinking that somehow it had gone behind the clouds, however if that were the case it would have come out. but it never returned. we had a wide open view of the sky and waited for it to show itself again. i never saw it reappear. it was amazing!! i felt like i had just witnessed something that was once in a lifetime!
content.summary: It was something that i have never seen before and i always have an eye to the sky!

content.detailedDescription: Same as short description.I have lived by the airports all my life never seen what i saw before. i was very excited to see it and was not afraid.I am an avid sky watcher,i have seen some strange stuff throughout my life, that orb was really pretty. the closest word i can use to describe it is scarlett orange.1 where: in my driveway.2 what: i always look at the stars. 3what did i think: i thought what is that? then the color was not like the planes or helicopters.Then i thought wow this is a ufo and thought the color on videos did not show like what i was seeing.4 describe:seemed as if it were floating. i watched it come from south strait ahead then going north but as it was going north it bobbed then headed west behind the trees.5 feelings:read above notations.6 lost sight: went behind the trees.
content.summary: Really pretty scarlett orange orb.Coming from the south, heading north, then wavering north west and dissapeared behind tree. i did not seem to be very high in the sky, but higher then the tree tops.L

content.detailedDescription:
I went out to back yard to smoke and i was looking at some stratus clouds and i noticed a large triangle shape in the eastern sky in the clouds. it had no lights, no noise and no mass.It looked as if a cookie cutter had stamped a triangle shape out of the clouds.I kept looking at it to figure if this was a natural occurrence, but it was too perfect a shape. it was slightly rounded at the nose, the two sides were longer and the rear was a bit shorter.As i watched, the shape moved with the cloud formation without loosing shape. i could see through it , it was as if something was there, but could not be seen. no lights, no sound , no structure to it. i watched as it continued to move to the north with the clouds, never loosing shape. i stopped looking when it passed behind some trees and houses. i can only guess at how large it was, the distance and altitude. 

i would guess it was more than two miles away. i would guess it was larger than an aircraft carrier and at least 10to15 thousand feet in altitude. there were no planes in the area. this is along a commercial flight path for smaller jets like 737 and 767's. the larger jets move higher at 35 thousand feet  toward the east. at this time of night ,planes go from east to west or east to north depending on what airport they are going to. this concludes my report.
content.summary: Observed triangle in eastern sky in stratus clouds. looked as if clouds were pubched out with cookie cutter. object moved with clouds.

content.detailedDescription:
I had just got off work was going out to a bar
saw ufo at slight angle on roof top of gulf gas station
3 small blue people like on deck of ufo & one white person like
looked like boss they were working on deck i watched them for 15-20 minutes
than left to go to tavern just a little ways about 2 miles away.
they may have had a helmet on that was 45 years ago
also back in 1964 just a little ways from that at a lake ufo'[s would show up almost ever day above that lake cant remember the name but it was just off of hwy.99 i would remember if i herd it again
also in that same time period i saw one fly over mc calsters motor cycle shop its got another name now but its still a motor cycle shop i think
we moved away a few years ago. just off hwy.99
i can take you where its at i still remember that.
i am talking like you were sitting next to me
i used to have a picture of the one at the lake don't know what ever happened to it just to long ago  i went back ther the next day it was not there
the ufo people were like 3-4 ft. tall guessing 
i waved one blue waved back the ufo was disk shaped 
i went to us air force office they gave me about 4 page of papers to fill out i never did. i was not scard of them at all i thought they were friendly . unlike all tv shows
1. watching ufo
2. light on gas station
3.Working on it on deck
4. stationary on gas station roof top about 3 ft. above guessing
5.Just watched workers work they may have had a deck panel up to work
6.I watched till i left about 15-20 minutes
email me if you want to talk about it for some reason i want to tell people about it
content.summary: Houvering above gulf gas station roof at slight angle

content.detailedDescription: On deck of home, drinking coffee, noticed part of yard darkened as if cloud obscured sun. looked directly up and saw object come from behind cloud into clear sky, then fly directly behind another cloud which blocked it completely. very clear details of rounded triangle shape, bright metallic gold color, and misty white glow from center of triangle shape.  appeared to be moving at speed approximately twice as fast as previously viewed lear jets leaving nearby airport. watched for several minutes, but did not see object come from behind clouds in any direction.  i was somewhat ecstatic to finally have clearly seen an object that i could not explain by any other means other than as an intelligently piloted, non-military craft.  i would have liked to get a video or still-frame, but the sighting was less than 10 seconds in duration.
content.summary: Short flyover of triangular gold craft with whitish glow in center.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my back porch, with a few high clouds in the sky, after the sun set. at about 9:50p, i happened to glance to my left, which would be to the south west, i noticed what i thought was a star. i looked at it for about 10 seconds, and then looked away. about 10 minutes later (about 10p)i noticed a commercial aircraft coming from the same general direction heading towards columbus, and that's when i noticed the "star" again, in the same position in the sky (sw towards wilmington), and at that point it just faded away. when it faded away the commercial aircraft was about straight out from me, which would be about in the northwest direction (the town is laid out in a "x" pattern sw to ne and nw to se). i kept looking in that direction where i saw the "star" and never saw it again. i checked again thursday night (7/25) to see if that "star" was there, and it was not, so i know it's not a normal star.
content.summary: "star" that just disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Witness (a) was in the yard when she noticed several;  long reflective silvery gray cylinder, blimp shaped, silent objects passing overhead at treetop level at 9:02 pm, just after sunset.  she called out to her husband, witness (b) to come out and see these objects.  looked to be about 10 feet long and 2 feet in diameter or a 1:5 ratio, diameter to length.   witness (b) observed one go directly over the house but no distinguishing details were observed, no dangling strings.
content.summary: Five reflective silvery gray cylinder blimp shaped silent objects, tree top level, going west to east,  several hundred feet apart, training along same path.

content.detailedDescription: Looking east @3:15 pm est i witnessed a bright orb exited out of a cloud bank, leaving a vapour trail of about 1 mile long and it arced and flew over me above another cloud bank and headed north travelling at 8-12 thousand mph. then it disappeared heading north.
content.summary: Ufo flew out of cloud with 1 mile vapor trail travelling at 8-12 thousand mph then flew behind another cloud and headed north

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were about to get into my truck which was in the drive way. she was getting something from her car which was parked in the street. i looked over at her and noticed a bright orange like light with a trail behind it. it was streaking across the sky and seemed very large or low. at first i thought it was an airplane or jet. i told her to look at it and we both staired at it for a few seconds and realized there was no sound at all. i had my canon t2i with me so i took multiple shots of it. it was going very fast. i ran inside my house to grab my father and go out the back to see it. by the time we got back there it was gone.
content.summary: Object flew with no sound and had a glowing trail. was very quick

content.detailedDescription:
We live outside of the city limits in the desert, houses here are one to three acres apart and there are no streetlights. i was preparing to go to bed at about 2:00am so i was out changing the puppy pads on our enclosed porch/sunroom which sits about 5 feet off of the ground.  when i finished the job i stood gazing out into the darkness, listening to the silence and feeling the depth of a quiet night.  i practice yoga so i was taking in a long breath and feeling the ambient stillness all around. i had been standing there about 2 minutes with my eyes open but not particularly focused because it was a dark, moonless night. then i saw a red light travel from my left to the right or from the east to the west.  instinctively i tracked it for perhaps 6 seconds.
the red light just came into my view so i did not see the origin of the light, then it traveled not fast but not slow and it just disappeared, like a quick fade out.   it appeared to be about 8 to 10 feet above the ground and made no sound.  

at first i assumed it was the tail light of a car reflecting off of the neighbors back porch windows. then i became oriented to the space and i realized that my house is on the far back part of the property almost an acre away from the residential road.  there is way too much brush, scrubby trees and cactus for a car's tail light to reach back here and then across another half acre to reflect off a neighbors window. also the main road is a rough dirt road and any car traveling five to ten mph at night or even in the daytime is clearly heard because gravel crunches under tires. i heard nothing like a car from the road.  at that point i became alarmed and thought that was a red orb and it just zoomed under my neighbors porch!   i went to bed pondering if i should tell the neighbor about it.  i decided against telling her, she is a recent widow and what good would it do telling her about the red orb, maybe it would scare her or make her think i am a nut.  

but wait! it gets weirder the following morning.  so i am on the phone with my other neighbor setting up a play date for our boys. she's seen ufos before and goes to ufo meetings, etc. so i confided in her about this red orb sighting.  i was describing to her what i saw and as i'm talking i walk onto the porch and i stand exactly where i was the night before to help me recall the details.  i look out and i do not see my neighbors porch like i used to.  i now see a huge untrimmed palo verde tree, fanned out like a peacock.  this tree was a "weed" a few years ago and we let it grow until the other landscaped plants grew bigger.  i had forgotten about the tree and now i stared at it in wonder.  so the red orb could not have flown under the neighbor's porch because i would not be able to see it through the bushy tree. the only conclusion i figured out was that  the red orb flew between the palo verde and my porch so that places the orb no more than 25 feet from me and maybe even closer!  this revised perspective felt more threatening to me.
content.summary: Red orb flew across my backyard

content.detailedDescription:
I was unloading groceries from a late nite shopping trip and paused,as i usually do,to look at the night sky and observe whatever stars i can see beyond the city lights of the l.A.Basin.
there was the usual landing lights from planes approaching a nearby airport and a couple helicopters on the horizon. i was raised with an aeronautical background so i am familiar with all the air traffic that crowds this sky,especially since i am within a couple mile from a military base to the west of me. a glowing round white yellowish shape hovered in the eastern black sky and i at first thought it was the moon behind some clouds. upon closer observation i noticed a straight line of blinking/pulsating red-orange lights above the shape. i have been witness to multiple ufo sightings over the span of decades and i stood still and watched it,noticing that there was a darker outline of a triangle. at that point,the lower whitish light disappeared and one by one,without moving,changing altitude, or direction,the red-orange lights in a row disappeared...And the sky reflected once again the city glow and stars where the object was. since it was a distance away, there's nothing else i can add except it was an unusual object in the clear night sky.
content.summary: What appeared to be the full moon rising,had a line of blinking red-orange lights that outlined the top of a triangle shape which hovered and completely evaporated above the city lights

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: As we were on the way out on simpson road, we can upon what looked like a star (huge--looked as if it was failing from the sky at first) but it didn't move at all. it was a very dark night (always is here, no lights) it just hovered there about 15 stories up in air. there were 3 very bright lights with something dark behind them. no sound, no blinking lights, triangle shaped, very scary, like it knew we were watching it and they were watching us. i slowed the car to 5 mph and one other car came behind me and was watching the same thing and slowed to my speed. no honking horns or flashing lights for me to move from the other car on a 35-45 mph road. another car put up behind the car behind me and stared too. all of us doing 5 mph, until we were going to turn into the housing tract, it disappeared completely and a second one appear at the far end of the city on a south west path. we turned on a road headed home the second one disappeared. later, that evening around 10:30 i looked one of the upstairs window and saw it again in the southwest direction, by the time i dressed and gabbed my cell for the camera, and a ran to the front yard it was gone.
content.summary: As we were on the way out on simpson road, we can upon what looked like a star huge (looked as if it was failing from the sky) but it dont move at all. i was a very dark night (always is here, no lights) it just hovered there about 15 stories up in air

content.detailedDescription:
It was the week of thanksgiving..At work first thing in the morning we were in the retail part of the store when a sonic boom like noise erupted and was so fierce it shook the building and large glass panels,the mechanic next door ran over to see what happen,originally we thougt a car exploded..Later on in the day two customers entered the store making no eye contact only to stare into the showcase infront of me,the 2 look different,there skin looked almost fake and a feeling overcame me,then they looked over and walked out,thursday thanks giving...The day passes as normal,then about 10pm i get a ride to my girlfriend house at the time,eat more food..During this the dog remained at the window with a nerbous stare,time passes i ask for a ride home..Time about 11pm,the night sky is perfectly a dark clear,the road being a dead end and a small river there as well and as i look up i see a bell shaped object floating extremely low to the ground,with green,blue and red lights along the bottom flashing in non sequence i point it out to my other,i become nervous and we get in the vechile,me driving home which is about 3blocks away..As im driving the object is following at the same speed as the vechile..I come to a stop sign at the end of my street then continue home,when im inside the tress and power lines are swooshing back and forth back and forth yet there is no wind,the windows did not rattle as usual,yet tops of tree were bending like hurricane winds would..As i sat on the bed..Trying to contemplate what was happening no sooner did i feel at the base of my spine thousands of little needles as when your foot falls asleep,this feeling continued uo my intire back until reaching my neck..At this time i layed in bed,lights off,and i close my eyes and i can still see the room as if they were open,i re-open my eyes and close them again and there they were,standing over me,2 to the left and one on my right,the one on the right had a female aura and the other 2 on the left seemed of male origin,as i looked to the right i gazed into those deep eyes and herd "do not worry u are safe"then i look to the left and 1 of them puts is hands into my stomch,i felt nothing,and then it removed what looked like a small glowing blue and orange orb..Almost like a small universe.....I passed out,waking up the next morning feeling drugged and sluggish..Not remembering the night before i go about my normal rutine,i go outside and its a perfect sunny day no clouds,i open my garage pill my car out and i notice in the sky in all its greatness..A saucer pure reflective metal..Ill never forget how the sun shone of it,it emitted a hps(high preasure sodium)like glow,orange yellow,it hovered there,i froze in awe,then it hovered to the right about 100ft then to the left like 25ft then back to the right a little more where it stopped and stayed..As i stared at it i had a though enter my head saying"we see you",i paniced and drove off to work never to forget the experience.
i also have a scoop mark with a symbol.
this is 100%true story with little missing detail
thank you for reading.
content.summary: 25 words isnt enough to explain

content.detailedDescription: I was outside with my coison just chilling when i got a  nice glimpse of the moon on the southern east side. i saw a really nice star right under it, but to my surprise, it was moving. at first, i thought it was an airplane, but then i noticed it hovered over the moon, revealing its unique triangular shape. slowly it moved to the west and then i saw it wasnt just one, it was 3. they all slowly followed the first one i saw, then surprisingly airplanes and hellicopters followed it also. it then slowly faded out into the horizon heading west, aka los angeles
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Triangle with 3 flashing lights. multiple hovering

content.detailedDescription: Castle hills, texas: family had just arrived home after dinner and short errand from local drug store at around 8:45. as we exited the car from the driveway i looked into the horizon and i noticed a bright green and red light in the air and informed the family. we live close to an airport and first thought it to be a plane. however it was hovering and then moved to the left and down slowly and then to the right and down much quickly but not in a normal airplane or helicopter pattern. before we could think about recording it on the phone it had moved downward and we lost sight of it behind the trees across the street.  all members of the family, two adults and two teens agreed that we saw the same thing and felt that it did not fit the description and/or movement of a plane or helicopter (which we see daily in our area).  the beauty of it was that the lights were so bright. it had red to the left of the object that appeared like a volume meter line and green to the right; something like 2 rectangles in red followed by 5 or 6 rectangles in green. we must have been staring at it for about a minute to a minute and a half before we lost sight of it. whatever it was that we saw it was an experience we felt we should share.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright green lights and a bright red light on the far left of what appeared to be a rectangular/oblong object with random flight pattern

content.detailedDescription: Observed four spherical rose peach colored objects at 11:10 pm while i was letting dog outside.They appeared to my south just over tree line bright with no sound no wings no rotors and to fast for balloons. they continued north for about two thousand feet gaining altitude then made a 90 degree turn to west and very rapidly gain altitude and extreme speed and faded away. i know this wasn't man made cause they were right over me when they made their direction change
content.summary: Glowing spheres

content.detailedDescription: Saw star-like orange orb approx. 30 - 40 degrees above horizon, moving in se direction in night sky.  boyfriend noticed first while sitting on patio and called me to come and look at it.  it moved in a horizontal line from east to south east direction.  i had never seen an orange orb floating in the sky before, could not identify what this was.  it disappeared behind a tree, so it must have kept moving in a south eastern direction.
content.summary: Saw orange orb moving in se direction in night sky.

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend was involved in a buddhist ceremony at her work in phuket thailand. the purpose of the ceremony was to acknowledge and show respect to spirits on the property and her workplace building, which happens to be a former cremation facility for victims of the recent tsunami. 
immediately after the ceremony a perfect halo formed around the sun. she photographed and videoed this halo with her iphone. the video shows a red dot moving quickly across the screen 2 times in different directions very fast with no distinct pattern. the photos show a red object, when enlarged appear to be a flying saucer. she never saw this object until reviewing the pics, hence she only saw the object on film, which will be attached below.  the object appears to be very far from earth and moving at godspeed.
 something else worth noting about the ceremony, which involved buddhist monks and a trained ceremony leader was that at least two attendees of the ceremony saw a man walking about the ceremony that others did not see. we know this because they both asked my girlfriend, who had arranged the ceremony, "who is that thai man in the fisherman pants?" my girlfriend replied "what thai man in fisherman pants? i don't see anyone". obviously, this thai man was believed to be a spirit.

please understand that while i gave you a usa phone number, that is a voice-mail only, as i am in thailand.  please contact me by email if you want and we can arrange a skype call in necessary. geoff
content.summary: Appeared on photos and video after both were taken to capture a halow around the sun.

content.detailedDescription: Was at work which puts me outside, around 1:50 pm july 24 2013 object headed north northeast at 500 ft. for 1/4 mile then accends to 700 to 800 ft. hovering for 10 min. then heads straight east accending and desennding.Friend spotted it then i was asking whats in the sky. seemed to me a mickey mouse ballon then turned and realized it wasnt a baloon. had a friend get his binoculours and looked through them and saw three diamonds with two forming the top and black due to the alttitude.Thought it was a rc airplane but too fast and to big for that i thought. went straight into the wind northwest then accends, plz tell me ballons do this. was telling everyone at work getting them into trouble trying to get as many witnesses as posissble.Had my girlfriend follow it for 20 min. then lost it due to going out of site due east accending and desending the whole time.
content.summary: Hexagonal, three diamonds with two for top, floats by low altttude then accends to 500ft. + then heads east
